title: Anomaly Detection in Multivariate Time Series Using Uncertainty Estimation
details: M Müller, G Ernis, M Mock - Informed Machine Learning, 2025
abstract: Today's industrial machines are equipped with several sensors that detect environmental changes and generate time series. One challenging task is the detection of anomalies in multivariate time series to proactively schedule machine …

title: AMAD: AutoMasked Attention for Unsupervised Multivariate Time Series Anomaly Detection
details: T Huang, Y Li - arXiv preprint arXiv:2504.06643, 2025
abstract: Unsupervised multivariate time series anomaly detection (UMTSAD) plays a critical role in various domains, including finance, networks, and sensor systems. In recent years, due to the outstanding performance of deep learning in general sequential …
